text: Mason-Dixon Polling & Research Inc. is an independent polling firm that conducts voter surveys for news media, lobbyists, advocacy groups, trade associations, and political action committees. Mason-Dixon is the nation's most active state polling organization, conducting copyrighted public opinion polls for news media organizations in all 50 states. These media clients include over 250 local television affiliates and over 100 daily newspapers. The polling firm tends to slightly lean conservative and has a B+ rating according to FiveThirtyEight. ==References== ==External links== *Mason-Dixon Polling & Research Inc. Category:Public opinion research companies in the United States
title: Mason-Dixon Polling & Research Inc.
